summary: Vargas, a 54 year old man, gets out of jail in the prvince of Corrientes, Argentina. Once released, he wants to find his now adult daughter, who lives in a swampy and remote area. To get ... See full summary »
cast: Argentino Vargas|Francisco Dornez|Yolanda Galarza|Víctor Varela|Francisco Salazar|Hilda Chamorro|Ángel Vera|Javier Lenciza|Raúl Fagundez|Saúl Gómez|Miguel Altamirano|Raúl Ramírez|José Urdangarín|Mario Omar|Ricardo Arriola|Feliciano Isla|Jorge Araujo
title: Los muertos
